name: Game: The Game!
description:
Since there are no tutorial in the actual game I'm gonna have a bunch of text here to explain to you what you need to do and what is what:

Left click to select the humans.

Right click to choose a position.

Right click on either a Tree, Rock or an Enemy to give them a task.

Right click on the shop to open it.

Right click anywhere else to close it.

The rest is self explanatory

This game was made for OMGJam4!

I clearly went out of scope on this game but I managed to finish it (With a ton of bugs).

There's only a windows build for now but I might make a Mac and Linux later, I have short amount of time right now!

If the game doesn't work then send me a comment or something *shrug*
